english.segment1: Turn on the spotlight, strike up the band. Everyone's looking my way. They came to see the excitement firsthand. And hear all that I've got to say
english.segment2: Oh, it makes me wonder. What if I slip, will they catch me. Or watch me fall?
english.segment3: I am walking on a wire. I tiptoe in through the fire. Never looking down to see that. I am walking on a wire. The pressure's getting higher. But I don't look around
english.segment4: Everyone roots for the winner. The others well maybe next time. Your time at the top only lasts fifteen minutes. Then they just leave you behind
english.segment5: Oh, it makes me wonder. What if I slip, will they catch me. Or watch me fall?
english.segment6: I am walking on a wire. I tiptoe in through the fire. Never looking down to see that. I am walking on a wire. The pressure's getting higher. But I don't look around. It's so far to the ground.
